header.header_text_21: Products for building cleanliness and hygiene

Onas.Onas_text_2: Welcome to the new Clemar website – your trusted partner in the field of professional cleaning! Formerly known as Clean Market with over 10 years of experience, we are pleased to introduce you to our refreshed and rebranded identity – Clemar. With us, you receive not only products but also guaranteed quality and professionalism in every detail. Clemar is the leading distributor of over 25 global brands specializing in cleaning equipment in Uzbekistan. Our range includes professional vacuum cleaners for dry and wet cleaning, as well as high-quality paper products, napkins, and paper towels. However, our primary focus is on scrubber dryers. At Clemar, you will find a wide selection of cordless and corded scrubbers from world-renowned brands. Our expertise and professionalism enable us to offer only the best solutions for maintaining cleanliness in any environment. We are proud to already collaborate with well-known companies, and our reputation in Uzbekistan affirms our place among the best. Clemar is not just a supplier, it is your reliable partner in the pursuit of cleanliness and order. Join us, choose Clemar, and ensure your business meets the highest standards of cleanliness and hygiene.

blue.blue_text_3: Do you want to buy professional equipment but are not ready to pay the full amount? We have a solution for you! Learn about our convenient installment plan that allows you to purchase the equipment you need now and pay for it gradually. Visit the 'Payment' section to get all the details and place your order today. Make your purchase even more affordable with Clemar!
blue.blue_text_5: Find out about our special offers and discounts! Visit the 'Promotions' section to stay informed about all the great deals Clemar has to offer. Save on your purchases and enjoy additional bonuses. Follow us on social media for even more surprises!

bollen.bollen_text_2: Leave your phone number, and our managers will contact you soon
